snippet: The number of unemployed people in France has surpassed three million for the first time since 1999, the country’s leaders say.
abstract: Number of unemployed people in France surpasses three million for the first time since 1999; latest total adds pressure on Pres Francois Hollande, whose administration is under attack for not doing enough to fix the economy.
lead_paragraph: The number of unemployed people in France has surpassed three million for the first time since 1999, the country’s leaders say.

headline.seo: Unemployment in France Rises to Highest Level Since 1999
